overview:
Vamshi Sriperumbudur is the VP of Marketing & GM at Dyyno.

Prior to Dyyno, Vamshi was the Senior Director of Marketing at Sonoa Systems / Apigee, a Norwest and Bay Partners funded company, where he drove field and customer acquisition marketing for its Cloud Analytics & Security offering. Prior to Sonoa, he was an acting VP of Marketing at various Cloud Computing start-ups including: Cloud Marketing Automation provider Market2Lead acquired by Oracle and Sequoia-funded Cast Iron Systems Cloud Integration acquired by IBM. Prior to that, Vamshi spent nearly eight years at the BPM & Analytics pioneer Vitria, where as the Director of Product Marketing he launched several products and industry specific solutions. Earlier in his career Vamshi was a Product Manager & Consultant at Sabre, where he led several airline solutions projects. He has a master’s degree in Computer Science from the University of Texas at Arlington. Vamshi is an active member of TiE Silicon Valley and led Marketing for the recent TiEcon’s.
